markdownRemark.html: I migrated my bootstrap blog to GitHub pages. Now I build my GitHub blog from cratch. I will try to perfect it.

prev.html: Today I set up the paginator[1,2] and comment[3] modal on my blog. Besides I fixed some layout glitches, too. It looks much better now.
